Poďakovanie patrí všetkým, ktorí sa akýmkoľvek spôsobom pričinili o prevod textov Liturgie hodín do elektronickej podoby. Ďakujem za všetky podnety, upozornenia na chyby, pripomienky a námety na zlepšenia.

OAMDG

News in v1.10:

  • Setting for displaying text of prayer in blind-friendly mode (only prayer text, without headings & rubrics) suitable for text-to-speech output.
  • New option in main screen: Ordinarium.
  • Fix of night-mode for Mary antiphones (compline).

News in v1.9.10:

  • Setting for automatic turning on silent mode when praying.
  • SK + HU: New option for first vespers hymn (ordinary time).

News in v1.9.9:

  • SK: CSS formatting of hymns.
  • HU: Plenty of small fixes & CSS formatting.

News in v1.9.8:

  • Long tap hides bottom navigation bar.
  • Added option for not-dimming screen.
  • SK: Various fixes.
  • CZ: CSS formatting of psalms and canticles.
  • HU: Plenty of small fixes.
